subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Davis, 21, has proved to be much more than a shot-blocking rim protector for the New Orleans Pelicans; he leads the player efficiency ratings at 33.43, more than double the league average.
snippet: Davis, 21, has proved to be much more than a shot-blocking rim protector for the New Orleans Pelicans; he leads the player efficiency ratings at 33.43, more than double the league average.
